articles.title: About this blog
articles.contents:
Who am I?
My name is Jo Kroese. Iâ€™m a data scientist based between Barcelona and Amsterdam.
What is this?
I realised studying maths had a big impact on the way I think about things. This blog looks at some of the models I take from maths to apply to life.
Why does it look so good?
The design is built on Before I Sleep by Miles McBain, licensed under Creative Commons Attribution CC BY 4.0.
